actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to expand the dwelling units with respect to which the credit for energy conservation expenditures may be allowed to dwelling units the construction of which was substantially completed before January 1, 1980.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to grant the income tax credit for residential energy conservation expenditures to dwelling units substantially completed before January 1, 1980.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to expand the dwelling units with respect to which the credit for energy conservation expenditures may be allowed to dwelling units the construction of which was substantially completed before January 1, 1980.
